  void _setupItemSlots() {
    // Create item slots with responsive positioning
    itemSlots = [];
    final slotsStartX = (scaledPanelWidth - (3 * scaledSlotWidth + 2 * scaledSlotSpacing)) / 2;
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      final slot = ShopSlot(
        position: Vector2(
          slotsStartX + i * (scaledSlotWidth + scaledSlotSpacing),
          121 * (scaledPanelHeight / basePanelHeight), // Scale the Y position too
        ),
      );
      // Update slot size to match scaled dimensions
      slot.size = Vector2(scaledSlotWidth, scaledSlotHeight);
      itemSlots.add(slot);
      add(slot);
    }
  }
  
  void show() {
    isVisible = true;
    opacity = 1.0;
  }
  
  void hide() {
    isVisible = false;
    opacity = 0.0;
  }
  
  @override
  void onRemove() {
    cleanupResponsive();
    super.onRemove();
  }
  
  /// Override to refresh child components when layout updates
  @override
  void updateResponsiveLayout() {
    super.updateResponsiveLayout();
    _refreshChildComponents();
  }
  
  /// Refresh all child components with current scaled dimensions
  void _refreshChildComponents() {
    // Remove and recreate all child components with new scaled dimensions
    removeAll(children.toList());
    _setupItemSlots();  // Initialize itemSlots first
    _setupVisualComponents();
    // Note: Don't call rollShopItems() here as it would reset the shop items
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (!isVisible) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if roll button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final rollButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      rollButton.position.x,
      rollButton.position.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (rollButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      rollShopItems();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if continue button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final continueButtonPosition = Vector2((basePanelWidth - 154) / 2 + 99, basePanelHeight - 71.5); // Updated from 140/90/65
    final continueButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      continueButtonPosition.x,
      continueButtonPosition.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (continueButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      closeShop();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void rollShopItems() {
    // Check if all items are sold (free roll)
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    
    // Get roll cost from configuration
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    
    // Check if player has enough coins to roll
    if (gameRef.hero.coins < rollCost) {
      return; // Not enough coins to roll
    }
    
    // Spend coins for rolling (if not free)
    if (rollCost > 0) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(rollCost);
    }
    
    final availableItems = _getAvailableItems();
    final random = Random();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      if (availableItems.isNotEmpty) {
        final randomItem = availableItems[random.nextInt(availableItems.length)];
        itemSlots[i].setItem(randomItem);
      }
    }
    
    // Update roll button text after rolling
    final newRollCost = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10;
    rollButtonText.text = 'REROLL ($newRollCost)';
  }
  
  List<ShopItem> _getAvailableItems() {
    final itemConfig = ItemConfig.instance;
    final shopConfig = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig;
    List<ShopItem> availableItems = [];
    final random = Random();
    
    for (final itemData in itemConfig.items) {
      // Skip health-related items in 1HP Challenge mode
      if (gameRef.currentGameMode == GameMode.oneHpChallenge) {
        if (itemData.effect.type == 'heal' || 
            itemData.effect.type == 'max_health_increase') {
          continue; // Skip health items in 1HP mode
        }
      }
      
      // Calculate scaled price based on current wave using configuration
      double waveMultiplier = 1.0;
      double randomMultiplier = 1.0;
      
      if (shopConfig != null) {
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (shopConfig.waveMultiplier * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = (1.0 - shopConfig.randomVariance) + (random.nextDouble() * shopConfig.randomVariance * 2);
      } else {
        // Fallback to old hardcoded values
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (0.2 * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = 0.95 + (random.nextDouble() * 0.1);
      }
      
      final scaledCost = (itemData.cost * waveMultiplier * randomMultiplier).round();
      
      // Create dynamic name for ability cooldown reduction based on hero's ability
      if (itemData.id == 'dash_mastery') {
        final heroAbilityName = gameRef.hero.heroData.ability.name;
        availableItems.add(ShopItem(
          id: itemData.id,
          name: '$heroAbilityName Mastery',
          cost: scaledCost,
          description: '-25% ${heroAbilityName} Cooldown',
          icon: itemData.icon,
          onPurchase: () => _applyItemEffect(itemData),
        ));
      } else {
        availableItems.add(ShopItem.fromItemData(itemData, () => _applyItemEffect(itemData), scaledCost));
      }
    }
    
    return availableItems;
  }
  
  void _applyItemEffect(ItemData itemData) {
    switch (itemData.effect.type) {
      case 'heal':
        final healAmount = (gameRef.hero.maxHealth - gameRef.hero.health).clamp(0.0, itemData.effect.value);
        gameRef.hero.heal(healAmount);
        break;
      case 'dash_cooldown_multiplier':
        // Apply ability cooldown reduction
        gameRef.hero.abilityCooldownMultiplier *= itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'max_health_increase':
        gameRef.hero.maxHealth += itemData.effect.value;
        gameRef.hero.health += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'attack_speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.attackSpeedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.speedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'range_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.rangeMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      // New stackable passive effects
      case 'projectile_count':
      case 'projectile_bounces':
      case 'projectile_size':
      case 'life_steal':
      case 'shield_hp':
      case 'coin_multiplier':
      case 'heal_per_kill':
      case 'crit_chance':
      case 'clone_spawn':
      case 'max_health_boost':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Max health boost only affects max HP, not current HP
        break;
      case 'drone_count':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update drone count immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateDroneCount();
        break;
      case 'auto_injector':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Auto-injector HP bonus is applied on kill, not on purchase
        break;
      case 'enlarged_caliber':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update hero size immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateHeroSize();
        break;
      default:
        print('Unknown item effect type: ${itemData.effect.type}');
    }
  }
  
  void onItemPurchased() {
    // Update roll button text based on remaining items
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    rollButtonText.text = rollCost == 0 ? 'REROLL (FREE)' : 'REROLL ($rollCost)';
  }
  
  void closeShop() {
    hide();
    gameRef.onShopClosed();
  }
}

  // Get category colors based on item type
  Map<String, Color> _getCategoryColors(String itemId) {
    switch (itemId) {
      case 'health_potion':
      case 'max_health_up':
        // Green for health items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF4CAF50),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF66BB6A),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF4CAF50),
        };
      case 'attack_speed_up':
        // Red for attack items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFFF44336),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFFE57373),
          'glow': const Color(0xFFF44336),
        };
      case 'speed_boost':
        // Blue for speed items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF2196F3),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF64B5F6),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF2196F3),
        };
      case 'dash_mastery':
        // Hero color for ability items
        final heroColor = gameRef.hero.heroData.color;
        return {
          'primary': heroColor,
          'secondary': heroColor.withOpacity(0.8),
          'glow': heroColor,
        };
      default:
        // Default blue theme
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF4A9EFF),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF64B5F6),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF4A9EFF),
        };
    }
  }

  void setItem(ShopItem item) async {
    currentItem = item;
    final colors = _getCategoryColors(item.id);
    
    nameText.text = item.name.toUpperCase();
    descriptionText.text = item.description;
    costText.text = '${item.cost} COINS';
    
    // Replace the current icon with a sprite-based icon
    if (itemIcon.isMounted) {
      itemIcon.removeFromParent();
    }
    
    try {
      // Try to load the actual item icon sprite
      final sprite = await Sprite.load(item.icon);
      itemIcon = SpriteComponent(
        sprite: sprite,
        size: Vector2(44, 44),
        position: Vector2((size.x - 44) / 2, 22),
        anchor: Anchor.topLeft,
      );
    } catch (e) {
      print('Could not load item icon: ${item.icon}, using colored rectangle fallback');
      // Fallback to colored rectangle with category color
      itemIcon = RectangleComponent(
        size: Vector2(44, 44),
        position: Vector2((size.x - 44) / 2, 22),
        paint: Paint()..color = colors['primary']!,
      );
    }
    
    add(itemIcon);
    
    // Update name text color to match category
    nameText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
      style: TextStyle(
        color: colors['primary']!,
        fontSize: 17.6,
        fontWeight: FontWeight.w900,
        letterSpacing: 1,
        shadows: [
          Shadow(
            color: colors['glow']!,
            blurRadius: 6,
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
    
    // Update border and glow colors to match category
    border.paint.color = colors['primary']!.withOpacity(0.6);
    outerGlow.paint.color = colors['glow']!.withOpacity(0.15);
    
    // Update buy button styling based on affordability and category
    if (gameRef.hero.coins >= item.cost) {
      // Update buy button gradient with category colors
      buyButton.paint.shader = LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          colors['primary']!,
          colors['secondary']!,
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = colors['glow']!.withOpacity(0.5);
      buyButtonText.text = 'PURCHASE';
    } else {
      // Grey for unaffordable items
      buyButton.paint.shader = const LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          Color(0xFF757575),
          Color(0xFF616161),
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = const Color(0xFF757575).withOpacity(0.3);
      buyButtonText.text = 'TOO EXPENSIVE';
      border.paint.color = const Color(0xFFF44336).withOpacity(0.4);
    }
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (currentItem == null) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if buy button was tapped
    if (buyButton.containsLocalPoint(localPoint - buyButton.position)) {
      attemptPurchase();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if item info area was tapped (anywhere except buy button)
    if (localPoint.y < buyButton.position.y) {
      showItemDetails();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void showItemDetails() {
    if (currentItem == null) return;
    
    final detailCard = ItemDetailCard(
      item: currentItem!,
      onClose: () {
        // Detail card handles its own removal
      },
    );
    
    // Add to the game at a high priority to appear on top
    gameRef.add(detailCard);
    
    // Play UI sound effect
    // SoundManager().playUICardOpenSound();
  }
  
  void attemptPurchase() {
    if (currentItem == null) return;
    
    if (gameRef.hero.coins >= currentItem!.cost) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(currentItem!.cost);
      currentItem!.onPurchase();
      
      // Play purchase sound effect
      SoundManager().playPurchaseSound();
      
      // Clear this slot with enhanced sold styling
      currentItem = null;
      nameText.text = 'SOLD';
      nameText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),
          fontSize: 17.6,
          fontWeight: FontWeight.w900,
          letterSpacing: 1.5,
          shadows: [
            Shadow(
              color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),
              blurRadius: 8,
            ),
            Shadow(
              color: Colors.black,
              blurRadius: 3,
            ),
          ],
        ),
      );
      descriptionText.text = 'Item purchased successfully!';
      descriptionText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),

## **✅ Shop Panel Crash Fixed!**

The issue was a classic initialization order problem. Here's what was happening and how I fixed it:

### **🐛 The Problem**
```dart
// OLD ORDER (BROKEN):
_setupVisualComponents();  // This calls rollShopItems() at the end
_setupItemSlots();         // This initializes itemSlots = []

// But rollShopItems() was trying to access itemSlots before it was initialized!
```

### **🔧 The Fix**
```dart
// NEW ORDER (WORKING):
_setupItemSlots();        // Initialize itemSlots FIRST
_setupVisualComponents(); // Then set up visual components
rollShopItems();         // Finally populate items after everything is ready
```

### **📋 What I Changed**

1. **Initialization Order**: 
   - `_setupItemSlots()` now runs first to initialize the `itemSlots` array
   - `_setupVisualComponents()` runs second
   - `rollShopItems()` runs last in `onLoad()` after everything is set up

2. **Removed Premature Call**: 
   - Removed `rollShopItems()` from the end of `_setupVisualComponents()`
   - Added it to the end of `onLoad()` instead

3. **Refresh Method**: 
   - Updated `_refreshChildComponents()` to maintain the correct order
   - Added note not to call `rollShopItems()` during refresh (would reset shop items)

class ShopItem {

  final String name;
  final int cost;
  final String description;
  final String icon;
  final void Function() onPurchase;
  
  ShopItem({
    required this.id,
    required this.name,
    required this.cost,
    required this.description,
    required this.icon,
    required this.onPurchase,
  });
  
  factory ShopItem.fromItemData(ItemData itemData, void Function() onPurchase, int scaledCost) {
    return ShopItem(
      id: itemData.id,
      name: itemData.name,
      cost: scaledCost,
      description: itemData.description,
      icon: itemData.icon,
      onPurchase: onPurchase,

  void _setupItemSlots() {
    // Create item slots with responsive positioning
    itemSlots = [];
    final slotsStartX = (scaledPanelWidth - (3 * scaledSlotWidth + 2 * scaledSlotSpacing)) / 2;
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      final slot = ShopSlot(
        position: Vector2(
          slotsStartX + i * (scaledSlotWidth + scaledSlotSpacing),
          121 * (scaledPanelHeight / basePanelHeight), // Scale the Y position too
        ),
      );
      // Update slot size to match scaled dimensions
      slot.size = Vector2(scaledSlotWidth, scaledSlotHeight);
      itemSlots.add(slot);
      add(slot);
    }
  }
  
  void show() {

    opacity = 1.0;

    isVisible = false;
    opacity = 0.0;

  @override
  void onRemove() {
    cleanupResponsive();
    super.onRemove();

  /// Override to refresh child components when layout updates
  @override
  void updateResponsiveLayout() {
    super.updateResponsiveLayout();
    _refreshChildComponents();
  }
  
  /// Refresh all child components with current scaled dimensions
  void _refreshChildComponents() {
    // Remove and recreate all child components with new scaled dimensions
    removeAll(children.toList());
    _setupItemSlots();  // Initialize itemSlots first
    _setupVisualComponents();
    // Note: Don't call rollShopItems() here as it would reset the shop items
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (!isVisible) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if roll button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final rollButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      rollButton.position.x,
      rollButton.position.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (rollButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      rollShopItems();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if continue button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final continueButtonPosition = Vector2((basePanelWidth - 154) / 2 + 99, basePanelHeight - 71.5); // Updated from 140/90/65
    final continueButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      continueButtonPosition.x,
      continueButtonPosition.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (continueButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      closeShop();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void rollShopItems() {
    // Check if all items are sold (free roll)
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    
    // Get roll cost from configuration
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    
    // Check if player has enough coins to roll
    if (gameRef.hero.coins < rollCost) {
      return; // Not enough coins to roll
    }
    
    // Spend coins for rolling (if not free)
    if (rollCost > 0) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(rollCost);
    }
    
    final availableItems = _getAvailableItems();
    final random = Random();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      if (availableItems.isNotEmpty) {
        final randomItem = availableItems[random.nextInt(availableItems.length)];
        itemSlots[i].setItem(randomItem);
      }
    }
    
    // Update roll button text after rolling
    final newRollCost = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10;
    rollButtonText.text = 'REROLL ($newRollCost)';
  }
  
  List<ShopItem> _getAvailableItems() {
    final itemConfig = ItemConfig.instance;
    final shopConfig = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig;
    List<ShopItem> availableItems = [];
    final random = Random();
    
    for (final itemData in itemConfig.items) {
      // Skip health-related items in 1HP Challenge mode
      if (gameRef.currentGameMode == GameMode.oneHpChallenge) {
        if (itemData.effect.type == 'heal' || 
            itemData.effect.type == 'max_health_increase') {
          continue; // Skip health items in 1HP mode
        }
      }
      
      // Calculate scaled price based on current wave using configuration
      double waveMultiplier = 1.0;
      double randomMultiplier = 1.0;
      
      if (shopConfig != null) {
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (shopConfig.waveMultiplier * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = (1.0 - shopConfig.randomVariance) + (random.nextDouble() * shopConfig.randomVariance * 2);
      } else {
        // Fallback to old hardcoded values
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (0.2 * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = 0.95 + (random.nextDouble() * 0.1);
      }
      
      final scaledCost = (itemData.cost * waveMultiplier * randomMultiplier).round();
      
      // Create dynamic name for ability cooldown reduction based on hero's ability
      if (itemData.id == 'dash_mastery') {
        final heroAbilityName = gameRef.hero.heroData.ability.name;
        availableItems.add(ShopItem(
          id: itemData.id,
          name: '$heroAbilityName Mastery',
          cost: scaledCost,
          description: '-25% ${heroAbilityName} Cooldown',
          icon: itemData.icon,
          onPurchase: () => _applyItemEffect(itemData),
        ));
      } else {
        availableItems.add(ShopItem.fromItemData(itemData, () => _applyItemEffect(itemData), scaledCost));
      }
    }
    
    return availableItems;
  }
  
  void _applyItemEffect(ItemData itemData) {
    switch (itemData.effect.type) {
      case 'heal':
        final healAmount = (gameRef.hero.maxHealth - gameRef.hero.health).clamp(0.0, itemData.effect.value);
        gameRef.hero.heal(healAmount);
        break;
      case 'dash_cooldown_multiplier':
        // Apply ability cooldown reduction
        gameRef.hero.abilityCooldownMultiplier *= itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'max_health_increase':
        gameRef.hero.maxHealth += itemData.effect.value;
        gameRef.hero.health += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'attack_speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.attackSpeedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.speedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'range_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.rangeMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      // New stackable passive effects
      case 'projectile_count':
      case 'projectile_bounces':
      case 'projectile_size':
      case 'life_steal':
      case 'shield_hp':
      case 'coin_multiplier':
      case 'heal_per_kill':
      case 'crit_chance':
      case 'clone_spawn':
      case 'max_health_boost':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Max health boost only affects max HP, not current HP
        break;
      case 'drone_count':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update drone count immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateDroneCount();
        break;
      case 'auto_injector':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Auto-injector HP bonus is applied on kill, not on purchase
        break;
      case 'enlarged_caliber':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update hero size immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateHeroSize();
        break;
      default:
        print('Unknown item effect type: ${itemData.effect.type}');
    }
  }
  
  void onItemPurchased() {
    // Update roll button text based on remaining items
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    rollButtonText.text = rollCost == 0 ? 'REROLL (FREE)' : 'REROLL ($rollCost)';
  }
  
  void closeShop() {
    hide();
    gameRef.onShopClosed();
  }
}

      return; // Not enough coins to roll
    }
    
    // Spend coins for rolling (if not free)
    if (rollCost > 0) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(rollCost);
    }
    
    final availableItems = _getAvailableItems();
    final random = Random();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      if (availableItems.isNotEmpty) {
        final randomItem = availableItems[random.nextInt(availableItems.length)];
        itemSlots[i].setItem(randomItem);
      }
    }
    
    // Update roll button text after rolling
    final newRollCost = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10;
    rollButtonText.text = 'REROLL ($newRollCost)';
  }
  
  List<ShopItem> _getAvailableItems() {
    final itemConfig = ItemConfig.instance;
    final shopConfig = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig;
    List<ShopItem> availableItems = [];
    final random = Random();
    
    for (final itemData in itemConfig.items) {
      // Skip health-related items in 1HP Challenge mode
      if (gameRef.currentGameMode == GameMode.oneHpChallenge) {
        if (itemData.effect.type == 'heal' || 
            itemData.effect.type == 'max_health_increase') {
          continue; // Skip health items in 1HP mode
        }
      }
      
      // Calculate scaled price based on current wave using configuration
      double waveMultiplier = 1.0;
      double randomMultiplier = 1.0;
      
      if (shopConfig != null) {
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (shopConfig.waveMultiplier * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = (1.0 - shopConfig.randomVariance) + (random.nextDouble() * shopConfig.randomVariance * 2);
      } else {
        // Fallback to old hardcoded values
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (0.2 * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = 0.95 + (random.nextDouble() * 0.1);
      }
      
      final scaledCost = (itemData.cost * waveMultiplier * randomMultiplier).round();
      
      // Create dynamic name for ability cooldown reduction based on hero's ability
      if (itemData.id == 'dash_mastery') {
        final heroAbilityName = gameRef.hero.heroData.ability.name;
        availableItems.add(ShopItem(
          id: itemData.id,
          name: '$heroAbilityName Mastery',
          cost: scaledCost,
          description: '-25% ${heroAbilityName} Cooldown',
          icon: itemData.icon,
          onPurchase: () => _applyItemEffect(itemData),
        ));
      } else {
        availableItems.add(ShopItem.fromItemData(itemData, () => _applyItemEffect(itemData), scaledCost));
      }
    }
    
    return availableItems;
  }
  
  void _applyItemEffect(ItemData itemData) {
    switch (itemData.effect.type) {
      case 'heal':
        final healAmount = (gameRef.hero.maxHealth - gameRef.hero.health).clamp(0.0, itemData.effect.value);
        gameRef.hero.heal(healAmount);
        break;
      case 'dash_cooldown_multiplier':
        // Apply ability cooldown reduction
        gameRef.hero.abilityCooldownMultiplier *= itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'max_health_increase':
        gameRef.hero.maxHealth += itemData.effect.value;
        gameRef.hero.health += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'attack_speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.attackSpeedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.speedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'range_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.rangeMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      // New stackable passive effects
      case 'projectile_count':
      case 'projectile_bounces':
      case 'projectile_size':
      case 'life_steal':
      case 'shield_hp':
      case 'coin_multiplier':
      case 'heal_per_kill':
      case 'crit_chance':
      case 'clone_spawn':
      case 'max_health_boost':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Max health boost only affects max HP, not current HP
        break;
      case 'drone_count':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update drone count immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateDroneCount();
        break;
      case 'auto_injector':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Auto-injector HP bonus is applied on kill, not on purchase
        break;
      case 'enlarged_caliber':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update hero size immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateHeroSize();
        break;
      default:
        print('Unknown item effect type: ${itemData.effect.type}');
    }
  }
  
  void onItemPurchased() {
    // Update roll button text based on remaining items
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    rollButtonText.text = rollCost == 0 ? 'REROLL (FREE)' : 'REROLL ($rollCost)';
  }
  
  void closeShop() {
    hide();
    gameRef.onShopClosed();
  }
}

  void _setupItemSlots() {
    // Create item slots with responsive positioning
    itemSlots = [];
    
    // Calculate positions relative to panel center (since panel anchor is center)
    final totalSlotsWidth = 3 * scaledSlotWidth + 2 * scaledSlotSpacing;
    final slotsStartX = -totalSlotsWidth / 2; // Start from left side relative to center
    final slotY = 121 * (scaledPanelHeight / basePanelHeight) - scaledPanelHeight / 2; // Relative to center
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      final slot = ShopSlot(
        position: Vector2(
          slotsStartX + (scaledSlotWidth / 2) + i * (scaledSlotWidth + scaledSlotSpacing), // Center each slot
          slotY + (scaledSlotHeight / 2), // Center vertically
        ),
      );
      // Update slot size to match scaled dimensions
      slot.size = Vector2(scaledSlotWidth, scaledSlotHeight);
      itemSlots.add(slot);
      add(slot);
    }
  }
  
  void show() {
    isVisible = true;
    opacity = 1.0;
  }
  
  void hide() {
    isVisible = false;
    opacity = 0.0;
  }
  
  @override
  void onRemove() {
    cleanupResponsive();
    super.onRemove();
  }
  
  /// Override to refresh child components when layout updates
  @override
  void updateResponsiveLayout() {
    super.updateResponsiveLayout();
    _refreshChildComponents();
  }
  
  /// Refresh all child components with current scaled dimensions
  void _refreshChildComponents() {
    // Remove and recreate all child components with new scaled dimensions
    removeAll(children.toList());
    _setupItemSlots();  // Initialize itemSlots first
    _setupVisualComponents();
    // Note: Don't call rollShopItems() here as it would reset the shop items
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (!isVisible) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if roll button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final rollButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      rollButton.position.x,
      rollButton.position.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (rollButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      rollShopItems();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if continue button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final continueButtonPosition = Vector2((basePanelWidth - 154) / 2 + 99, basePanelHeight - 71.5); // Updated from 140/90/65
    final continueButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      continueButtonPosition.x,
      continueButtonPosition.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (continueButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      closeShop();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void rollShopItems() {
    // Check if all items are sold (free roll)
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    
    // Get roll cost from configuration
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    
    // Check if player has enough coins to roll
    if (gameRef.hero.coins < rollCost) {
      return; // Not enough coins to roll
    }
    
    // Spend coins for rolling (if not free)
    if (rollCost > 0) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(rollCost);
    }
    
    final availableItems = _getAvailableItems();
    final random = Random();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      if (availableItems.isNotEmpty) {
        final randomItem = availableItems[random.nextInt(availableItems.length)];
        itemSlots[i].setItem(randomItem);
      }
    }
    
    // Update roll button text after rolling
    final newRollCost = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10;
    rollButtonText.text = 'REROLL ($newRollCost)';
  }
  
  List<ShopItem> _getAvailableItems() {
    final itemConfig = ItemConfig.instance;
    final shopConfig = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig;
    List<ShopItem> availableItems = [];
    final random = Random();
    
    for (final itemData in itemConfig.items) {
      // Skip health-related items in 1HP Challenge mode
      if (gameRef.currentGameMode == GameMode.oneHpChallenge) {
        if (itemData.effect.type == 'heal' || 
            itemData.effect.type == 'max_health_increase') {
          continue; // Skip health items in 1HP mode
        }
      }
      
      // Calculate scaled price based on current wave using configuration
      double waveMultiplier = 1.0;
      double randomMultiplier = 1.0;
      
      if (shopConfig != null) {
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (shopConfig.waveMultiplier * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = (1.0 - shopConfig.randomVariance) + (random.nextDouble() * shopConfig.randomVariance * 2);
      } else {
        // Fallback to old hardcoded values
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (0.2 * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = 0.95 + (random.nextDouble() * 0.1);
      }
      
      final scaledCost = (itemData.cost * waveMultiplier * randomMultiplier).round();
      
      // Create dynamic name for ability cooldown reduction based on hero's ability
      if (itemData.id == 'dash_mastery') {
        final heroAbilityName = gameRef.hero.heroData.ability.name;
        availableItems.add(ShopItem(
          id: itemData.id,
          name: '$heroAbilityName Mastery',
          cost: scaledCost,
          description: '-25% ${heroAbilityName} Cooldown',
          icon: itemData.icon,
          onPurchase: () => _applyItemEffect(itemData),
        ));
      } else {
        availableItems.add(ShopItem.fromItemData(itemData, () => _applyItemEffect(itemData), scaledCost));
      }
    }
    
    return availableItems;
  }
  
  void _applyItemEffect(ItemData itemData) {
    switch (itemData.effect.type) {
      case 'heal':
        final healAmount = (gameRef.hero.maxHealth - gameRef.hero.health).clamp(0.0, itemData.effect.value);
        gameRef.hero.heal(healAmount);
        break;
      case 'dash_cooldown_multiplier':
        // Apply ability cooldown reduction
        gameRef.hero.abilityCooldownMultiplier *= itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'max_health_increase':
        gameRef.hero.maxHealth += itemData.effect.value;
        gameRef.hero.health += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'attack_speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.attackSpeedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.speedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'range_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.rangeMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      // New stackable passive effects
      case 'projectile_count':
      case 'projectile_bounces':
      case 'projectile_size':
      case 'life_steal':
      case 'shield_hp':
      case 'coin_multiplier':
      case 'heal_per_kill':
      case 'crit_chance':
      case 'clone_spawn':
      case 'max_health_boost':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Max health boost only affects max HP, not current HP
        break;
      case 'drone_count':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update drone count immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateDroneCount();
        break;
      case 'auto_injector':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Auto-injector HP bonus is applied on kill, not on purchase
        break;
      case 'enlarged_caliber':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update hero size immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateHeroSize();
        break;
      default:
        print('Unknown item effect type: ${itemData.effect.type}');
    }
  }
  
  void onItemPurchased() {
    // Update roll button text based on remaining items
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    rollButtonText.text = rollCost == 0 ? 'REROLL (FREE)' : 'REROLL ($rollCost)';
  }
  
  void closeShop() {
    hide();
    gameRef.onShopClosed();
  }
}

  // Get category colors based on item type
  Map<String, Color> _getCategoryColors(String itemId) {
    switch (itemId) {
      case 'health_potion':
      case 'max_health_up':
        // Green for health items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF4CAF50),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF66BB6A),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF4CAF50),
        };
      case 'attack_speed_up':
        // Red for attack items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFFF44336),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFFE57373),
          'glow': const Color(0xFFF44336),
        };
      case 'speed_boost':
        // Blue for speed items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF2196F3),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF64B5F6),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF2196F3),
        };
      case 'dash_mastery':
        // Hero color for ability items
        final heroColor = gameRef.hero.heroData.color;
        return {
          'primary': heroColor,
          'secondary': heroColor.withOpacity(0.8),
          'glow': heroColor,
        };
      default:
        // Default blue theme
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF4A9EFF),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF64B5F6),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF4A9EFF),
        };
    }
  }

  void setItem(ShopItem item) async {
    currentItem = item;
    final colors = _getCategoryColors(item.id);
    
    nameText.text = item.name.toUpperCase();
    descriptionText.text = item.description;
    costText.text = '${item.cost} COINS';
    
    // Replace the current icon with a sprite-based icon
    if (itemIcon.isMounted) {
      itemIcon.removeFromParent();
    }
    
    try {
      // Try to load the actual item icon sprite
      final sprite = await Sprite.load(item.icon);
      itemIcon = SpriteComponent(
        sprite: sprite,
        size: Vector2(44, 44),
        position: Vector2((size.x - 44) / 2, 22),
        anchor: Anchor.topLeft,
      );
    } catch (e) {
      print('Could not load item icon: ${item.icon}, using colored rectangle fallback');
      // Fallback to colored rectangle with category color
      itemIcon = RectangleComponent(
        size: Vector2(44, 44),
        position: Vector2((size.x - 44) / 2, 22),
        paint: Paint()..color = colors['primary']!,
      );
    }
    
    add(itemIcon);
    
    // Update name text color to match category
    nameText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
      style: TextStyle(
        color: colors['primary']!,
        fontSize: 17.6,
        fontWeight: FontWeight.w900,
        letterSpacing: 1,
        shadows: [
          Shadow(
            color: colors['glow']!,
            blurRadius: 6,
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
    
    // Update border and glow colors to match category
    border.paint.color = colors['primary']!.withOpacity(0.6);
    outerGlow.paint.color = colors['glow']!.withOpacity(0.15);
    
    // Update buy button styling based on affordability and category
    if (gameRef.hero.coins >= item.cost) {
      // Update buy button gradient with category colors
      buyButton.paint.shader = LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          colors['primary']!,
          colors['secondary']!,
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = colors['glow']!.withOpacity(0.5);
      buyButtonText.text = 'PURCHASE';
    } else {
      // Grey for unaffordable items
      buyButton.paint.shader = const LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          Color(0xFF757575),
          Color(0xFF616161),
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = const Color(0xFF757575).withOpacity(0.3);
      buyButtonText.text = 'TOO EXPENSIVE';
      border.paint.color = const Color(0xFFF44336).withOpacity(0.4);
    }
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (currentItem == null) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if buy button was tapped
    if (buyButton.containsLocalPoint(localPoint - buyButton.position)) {
      attemptPurchase();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if item info area was tapped (anywhere except buy button)
    if (localPoint.y < buyButton.position.y) {
      showItemDetails();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void showItemDetails() {
    if (currentItem == null) return;
    
    final detailCard = ItemDetailCard(
      item: currentItem!,
      onClose: () {
        // Detail card handles its own removal
      },
    );
    
    // Add to the game at a high priority to appear on top
    gameRef.add(detailCard);
    
    // Play UI sound effect
    // SoundManager().playUICardOpenSound();
  }
  
  void attemptPurchase() {
    if (currentItem == null) return;
    
    if (gameRef.hero.coins >= currentItem!.cost) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(currentItem!.cost);
      currentItem!.onPurchase();
      
      // Play purchase sound effect
      SoundManager().playPurchaseSound();
      
      // Clear this slot with enhanced sold styling
      currentItem = null;
      nameText.text = 'SOLD';
      nameText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),

      descriptionText.text = 'Item purchased successfully!';
      descriptionText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),
          fontSize: 13.2,
          fontWeight: FontWeight.w500,
          height: 1.4,
        ),
      );
      costText.text = '';
      
      // Update buy button to sold out styling
      buyButton.paint.shader = const LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          Color(0xFF757575),
          Color(0xFF616161),
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = const Color(0xFF757575).withOpacity(0.3);

  void _setupItemSlots() {
    // Create item slots with responsive positioning
    itemSlots = [];
    
    // Calculate positions relative to panel center (since panel anchor is center)
    final totalSlotsWidth = 3 * scaledSlotWidth + 2 * scaledSlotSpacing;
    final slotsStartX = -totalSlotsWidth / 2; // Start from left side relative to center
    final slotY = 121 * (scaledPanelHeight / basePanelHeight) - scaledPanelHeight / 2; // Relative to center
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      final slot = ShopSlot(
        position: Vector2(
          slotsStartX + (scaledSlotWidth / 2) + i * (scaledSlotWidth + scaledSlotSpacing), // Center each slot
          slotY + (scaledSlotHeight / 2), // Center vertically
        ),
      );
      // Update slot size to match scaled dimensions
      slot.size = Vector2(scaledSlotWidth, scaledSlotHeight);
      itemSlots.add(slot);
      add(slot);
    }
  }
  
  void show() {
    isVisible = true;
    opacity = 1.0;
  }
  
  void hide() {
    isVisible = false;
    opacity = 0.0;
  }

  void _refreshChildComponents() {
    // Remove and recreate all child components with new scaled dimensions
    removeAll(children.toList());
    _setupItemSlots();  // Initialize itemSlots first
    _setupVisualComponents();
    // Note: Don't call rollShopItems() here as it would reset the shop items
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (!isVisible) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if roll button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final rollButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      rollButton.position.x,
      rollButton.position.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (rollButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      rollShopItems();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if continue button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final continueButtonPosition = Vector2((basePanelWidth - 154) / 2 + 99, basePanelHeight - 71.5); // Updated from 140/90/65
    final continueButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      continueButtonPosition.x,
      continueButtonPosition.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (continueButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      closeShop();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void rollShopItems() {
    // Check if all items are sold (free roll)
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    
    // Get roll cost from configuration
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    
    // Check if player has enough coins to roll
    if (gameRef.hero.coins < rollCost) {
      return; // Not enough coins to roll
    }
    
    // Spend coins for rolling (if not free)
    if (rollCost > 0) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(rollCost);
    }
    
    final availableItems = _getAvailableItems();
    final random = Random();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      if (availableItems.isNotEmpty) {
        final randomItem = availableItems[random.nextInt(availableItems.length)];
        itemSlots[i].setItem(randomItem);
      }
    }
    
    // Update roll button text after rolling
    final newRollCost = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10;
    rollButtonText.text = 'REROLL ($newRollCost)';
  }
  
  List<ShopItem> _getAvailableItems() {
    final itemConfig = ItemConfig.instance;
    final shopConfig = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig;
    List<ShopItem> availableItems = [];
    final random = Random();
    
    for (final itemData in itemConfig.items) {
      // Skip health-related items in 1HP Challenge mode
      if (gameRef.currentGameMode == GameMode.oneHpChallenge) {
        if (itemData.effect.type == 'heal' || 
            itemData.effect.type == 'max_health_increase') {
          continue; // Skip health items in 1HP mode
        }
      }
      
      // Calculate scaled price based on current wave using configuration
      double waveMultiplier = 1.0;
      double randomMultiplier = 1.0;
      
      if (shopConfig != null) {
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (shopConfig.waveMultiplier * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = (1.0 - shopConfig.randomVariance) + (random.nextDouble() * shopConfig.randomVariance * 2);
      } else {
        // Fallback to old hardcoded values
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (0.2 * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = 0.95 + (random.nextDouble() * 0.1);
      }
      
      final scaledCost = (itemData.cost * waveMultiplier * randomMultiplier).round();
      
      // Create dynamic name for ability cooldown reduction based on hero's ability
      if (itemData.id == 'dash_mastery') {
        final heroAbilityName = gameRef.hero.heroData.ability.name;
        availableItems.add(ShopItem(
          id: itemData.id,
          name: '$heroAbilityName Mastery',
          cost: scaledCost,
          description: '-25% ${heroAbilityName} Cooldown',
          icon: itemData.icon,
          onPurchase: () => _applyItemEffect(itemData),
        ));
      } else {
        availableItems.add(ShopItem.fromItemData(itemData, () => _applyItemEffect(itemData), scaledCost));
      }
    }
    
    return availableItems;
  }
  
  void _applyItemEffect(ItemData itemData) {
    switch (itemData.effect.type) {
      case 'heal':
        final healAmount = (gameRef.hero.maxHealth - gameRef.hero.health).clamp(0.0, itemData.effect.value);
        gameRef.hero.heal(healAmount);
        break;
      case 'dash_cooldown_multiplier':
        // Apply ability cooldown reduction
        gameRef.hero.abilityCooldownMultiplier *= itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'max_health_increase':
        gameRef.hero.maxHealth += itemData.effect.value;
        gameRef.hero.health += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'attack_speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.attackSpeedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.speedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'range_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.rangeMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      // New stackable passive effects
      case 'projectile_count':
      case 'projectile_bounces':
      case 'projectile_size':
      case 'life_steal':
      case 'shield_hp':
      case 'coin_multiplier':
      case 'heal_per_kill':
      case 'crit_chance':
      case 'clone_spawn':
      case 'max_health_boost':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Max health boost only affects max HP, not current HP
        break;
      case 'drone_count':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update drone count immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateDroneCount();
        break;
      case 'auto_injector':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Auto-injector HP bonus is applied on kill, not on purchase
        break;
      case 'enlarged_caliber':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update hero size immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateHeroSize();
        break;
      default:
        print('Unknown item effect type: ${itemData.effect.type}');
    }
  }
  
  void onItemPurchased() {
    // Update roll button text based on remaining items
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    rollButtonText.text = rollCost == 0 ? 'REROLL (FREE)' : 'REROLL ($rollCost)';
  }
  
  void closeShop() {
    hide();
    gameRef.onShopClosed();
  }
}

        ..color = const Color(0xFF4CAF50).withOpacity(0.5)
        ..maskFilter = const MaskFilter.blur(BlurStyle.normal, 6),
      position: Vector2((size.x - 143) / 2, size.y - 60.5),
    );
    add(buyButtonGlow);
    
    buyButtonText = TextComponent(
      text: 'PURCHASE',
      textRenderer: TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Colors.white,
          fontSize: 15.4,
          fontWeight: FontWeight.w900,
          letterSpacing: 1.2,
          shadows: [
            Shadow(
              color: Colors.black,
              blurRadius: 4,
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      anchor: Anchor.center,
      position: Vector2(71.5, 22),
    );
    buyButton.add(buyButtonText);
  }
  
  // Get category colors based on item type
  Map<String, Color> _getCategoryColors(String itemId) {
    switch (itemId) {
      case 'health_potion':
      case 'max_health_up':
        // Green for health items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF4CAF50),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF66BB6A),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF4CAF50),
        };
      case 'attack_speed_up':
        // Red for attack items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFFF44336),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFFE57373),
          'glow': const Color(0xFFF44336),
        };
      case 'speed_boost':
        // Blue for speed items
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF2196F3),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF64B5F6),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF2196F3),
        };
      case 'dash_mastery':
        // Hero color for ability items
        final heroColor = gameRef.hero.heroData.color;
        return {
          'primary': heroColor,
          'secondary': heroColor.withOpacity(0.8),
          'glow': heroColor,
        };
      default:
        // Default blue theme
        return {
          'primary': const Color(0xFF4A9EFF),
          'secondary': const Color(0xFF64B5F6),
          'glow': const Color(0xFF4A9EFF),
        };
    }
  }

  void setItem(ShopItem item) async {
    currentItem = item;
    final colors = _getCategoryColors(item.id);
    
    nameText.text = item.name.toUpperCase();
    descriptionText.text = item.description;
    costText.text = '${item.cost} COINS';
    
    // Replace the current icon with a sprite-based icon
    if (itemIcon.isMounted) {
      itemIcon.removeFromParent();
    }
    
    try {
      // Try to load the actual item icon sprite
      final sprite = await Sprite.load(item.icon);
      itemIcon = SpriteComponent(
        sprite: sprite,
        size: Vector2(44, 44),
        position: Vector2((size.x - 44) / 2, 22),
        anchor: Anchor.topLeft,
      );
    } catch (e) {
      print('Could not load item icon: ${item.icon}, using colored rectangle fallback');
      // Fallback to colored rectangle with category color
      itemIcon = RectangleComponent(
        size: Vector2(44, 44),
        position: Vector2((size.x - 44) / 2, 22),
        paint: Paint()..color = colors['primary']!,
      );
    }
    
    add(itemIcon);
    
    // Update name text color to match category
    nameText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
      style: TextStyle(
        color: colors['primary']!,
        fontSize: 17.6,
        fontWeight: FontWeight.w900,
        letterSpacing: 1,
        shadows: [
          Shadow(
            color: colors['glow']!,
            blurRadius: 6,
          ),
        ],
      ),
    );
    
    // Update border and glow colors to match category
    border.paint.color = colors['primary']!.withOpacity(0.6);
    outerGlow.paint.color = colors['glow']!.withOpacity(0.15);
    
    // Update buy button styling based on affordability and category
    if (gameRef.hero.coins >= item.cost) {
      // Update buy button gradient with category colors
      buyButton.paint.shader = LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          colors['primary']!,
          colors['secondary']!,
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = colors['glow']!.withOpacity(0.5);
      buyButtonText.text = 'PURCHASE';
    } else {
      // Grey for unaffordable items
      buyButton.paint.shader = const LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          Color(0xFF757575),
          Color(0xFF616161),
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = const Color(0xFF757575).withOpacity(0.3);
      buyButtonText.text = 'TOO EXPENSIVE';
      border.paint.color = const Color(0xFFF44336).withOpacity(0.4);
    }
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (currentItem == null) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if buy button was tapped
    if (buyButton.containsLocalPoint(localPoint - buyButton.position)) {
      attemptPurchase();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if item info area was tapped (anywhere except buy button)
    if (localPoint.y < buyButton.position.y) {
      showItemDetails();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void showItemDetails() {
    if (currentItem == null) return;
    
    final detailCard = ItemDetailCard(
      item: currentItem!,
      onClose: () {
        // Detail card handles its own removal
      },
    );
    
    // Add to the game at a high priority to appear on top
    gameRef.add(detailCard);
    
    // Play UI sound effect
    // SoundManager().playUICardOpenSound();
  }
  
  void attemptPurchase() {
    if (currentItem == null) return;
    
    if (gameRef.hero.coins >= currentItem!.cost) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(currentItem!.cost);
      currentItem!.onPurchase();
      
      // Play purchase sound effect
      SoundManager().playPurchaseSound();
      
      // Clear this slot with enhanced sold styling
      currentItem = null;
      nameText.text = 'SOLD';
      nameText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),
          fontSize: 17.6,
          fontWeight: FontWeight.w900,
          letterSpacing: 1.5,
          shadows: [
            Shadow(
              color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),
              blurRadius: 8,
            ),
            Shadow(
              color: Colors.black,
              blurRadius: 3,
            ),
          ],
        ),
      );
      descriptionText.text = 'Item purchased successfully!';
      descriptionText.textRenderer = TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Color(0xFF4CAF50),
          fontSize: 13.2,
          fontWeight: FontWeight.w500,
          height: 1.4,
        ),
      );
      costText.text = '';
      
      // Update buy button to sold out styling
      buyButton.paint.shader = const LinearGradient(
        colors: [
          Color(0xFF757575),
          Color(0xFF616161),
        ],
      ).createShader(Rect.fromLTWH(0, 0, 143, 44));
      
      buyButtonGlow.paint.color = const Color(0xFF757575).withOpacity(0.3);
      buyButtonText.text = 'SOLD OUT';
      
      // Update border and glow to success green
      border.paint.color = const Color(0xFF4CAF50).withOpacity(0.8);
      outerGlow.paint.color = const Color(0xFF4CAF50).withOpacity(0.2);
      
      // Clear the item icon - handle both SpriteComponent and RectangleComponent types
      if (itemIcon.isMounted) {
        itemIcon.removeFromParent();
      }
      
      // Add transparent placeholder
      itemIcon = RectangleComponent(
        size: Vector2(44, 44),
        position: Vector2((size.x - 44) / 2, 22),
        paint: Paint()..color = Colors.transparent,
      );
      add(itemIcon);
      
      // Update parent shop immediately
      if (parent is ShopPanel) {
        (parent as ShopPanel).onItemPurchased();
      }
    }
  }

class ShopItem {
  final String id;
  final String name;
  final int cost;
  final String description;
  final String icon;
  final void Function() onPurchase;
  
  ShopItem({
    required this.id,
    required this.name,
    required this.cost,
    required this.description,
    required this.icon,
    required this.onPurchase,
  });
  
  factory ShopItem.fromItemData(ItemData itemData, void Function() onPurchase, int scaledCost) {
    return ShopItem(
      id: itemData.id,
      name: itemData.name,
      cost: scaledCost,
      description: itemData.description,
      icon: itemData.icon,
      onPurchase: onPurchase,
    );
  }
}

  void _setupItemSlots() {
    // Create item slots with responsive positioning
    itemSlots = [];
    
    // Calculate positions relative to panel center (since panel anchor is center)
    final totalSlotsWidth = 3 * scaledSlotWidth + 2 * scaledSlotSpacing;
    final slotsStartX = -totalSlotsWidth / 2; // Start from left side relative to center
    final slotY = 121 * (scaledPanelHeight / basePanelHeight) - scaledPanelHeight / 2; // Relative to center
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      final slot = ShopSlot(
        position: Vector2(
          slotsStartX + (scaledSlotWidth / 2) + i * (scaledSlotWidth + scaledSlotSpacing), // Center each slot
          slotY + (scaledSlotHeight / 2), // Center vertically
        ),
      );
      // Update slot size to match scaled dimensions
      slot.size = Vector2(scaledSlotWidth, scaledSlotHeight);
      itemSlots.add(slot);
      add(slot);
    }
  }
  
  void show() {
    isVisible = true;
    opacity = 1.0;
  }
  
  void hide() {
    isVisible = false;
    opacity = 0.0;
  }
  
  @override
  void onRemove() {
    cleanupResponsive();
    super.onRemove();
  }
  
  /// Override to refresh child components when layout updates
  @override
  void updateResponsiveLayout() {
    super.updateResponsiveLayout();
    _refreshChildComponents();
  }
  
  /// Refresh all child components with current scaled dimensions
  void _refreshChildComponents() {
    // Remove and recreate all child components with new scaled dimensions
    removeAll(children.toList());
    _setupItemSlots();  // Initialize itemSlots first
    _setupVisualComponents();
    // Note: Don't call rollShopItems() here as it would reset the shop items
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (!isVisible) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if roll button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final rollButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      rollButton.position.x,
      rollButton.position.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (rollButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      rollShopItems();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if continue button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final continueButtonPosition = Vector2((basePanelWidth - 154) / 2 + 99, basePanelHeight - 71.5); // Updated from 140/90/65
    final continueButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      continueButtonPosition.x,
      continueButtonPosition.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (continueButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      closeShop();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void rollShopItems() {
    // Check if all items are sold (free roll)
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    
    // Get roll cost from configuration
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    
    // Check if player has enough coins to roll
    if (gameRef.hero.coins < rollCost) {
      return; // Not enough coins to roll
    }
    
    // Spend coins for rolling (if not free)
    if (rollCost > 0) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(rollCost);
    }
    
    final availableItems = _getAvailableItems();
    final random = Random();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      if (availableItems.isNotEmpty) {
        final randomItem = availableItems[random.nextInt(availableItems.length)];
        itemSlots[i].setItem(randomItem);
      }
    }
    
    // Update roll button text after rolling
    final newRollCost = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10;
    rollButtonText.text = 'REROLL ($newRollCost)';
  }
  
  List<ShopItem> _getAvailableItems() {
    final itemConfig = ItemConfig.instance;
    final shopConfig = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig;
    List<ShopItem> availableItems = [];
    final random = Random();
    
    for (final itemData in itemConfig.items) {
      // Skip health-related items in 1HP Challenge mode
      if (gameRef.currentGameMode == GameMode.oneHpChallenge) {
        if (itemData.effect.type == 'heal' || 
            itemData.effect.type == 'max_health_increase') {
          continue; // Skip health items in 1HP mode
        }
      }
      
      // Calculate scaled price based on current wave using configuration
      double waveMultiplier = 1.0;
      double randomMultiplier = 1.0;
      
      if (shopConfig != null) {
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (shopConfig.waveMultiplier * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = (1.0 - shopConfig.randomVariance) + (random.nextDouble() * shopConfig.randomVariance * 2);
      } else {
        // Fallback to old hardcoded values
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (0.2 * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = 0.95 + (random.nextDouble() * 0.1);
      }
      
      final scaledCost = (itemData.cost * waveMultiplier * randomMultiplier).round();
      
      // Create dynamic name for ability cooldown reduction based on hero's ability
      if (itemData.id == 'dash_mastery') {
        final heroAbilityName = gameRef.hero.heroData.ability.name;
        availableItems.add(ShopItem(
          id: itemData.id,
          name: '$heroAbilityName Mastery',
          cost: scaledCost,
          description: '-25% ${heroAbilityName} Cooldown',
          icon: itemData.icon,
          onPurchase: () => _applyItemEffect(itemData),
        ));
      } else {
        availableItems.add(ShopItem.fromItemData(itemData, () => _applyItemEffect(itemData), scaledCost));
      }
    }
    
    return availableItems;
  }
  
  void _applyItemEffect(ItemData itemData) {
    switch (itemData.effect.type) {
      case 'heal':
        final healAmount = (gameRef.hero.maxHealth - gameRef.hero.health).clamp(0.0, itemData.effect.value);
        gameRef.hero.heal(healAmount);
        break;
      case 'dash_cooldown_multiplier':
        // Apply ability cooldown reduction
        gameRef.hero.abilityCooldownMultiplier *= itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'max_health_increase':
        gameRef.hero.maxHealth += itemData.effect.value;
        gameRef.hero.health += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'attack_speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.attackSpeedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.speedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'range_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.rangeMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      // New stackable passive effects
      case 'projectile_count':
      case 'projectile_bounces':
      case 'projectile_size':
      case 'life_steal':
      case 'shield_hp':
      case 'coin_multiplier':
      case 'heal_per_kill':
      case 'crit_chance':
      case 'clone_spawn':
      case 'max_health_boost':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Max health boost only affects max HP, not current HP
        break;
      case 'drone_count':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update drone count immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateDroneCount();
        break;
      case 'auto_injector':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Auto-injector HP bonus is applied on kill, not on purchase
        break;
      case 'enlarged_caliber':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update hero size immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateHeroSize();
        break;
      default:
        print('Unknown item effect type: ${itemData.effect.type}');
    }
  }
  
  void onItemPurchased() {
    // Update roll button text based on remaining items
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    rollButtonText.text = rollCost == 0 ? 'REROLL (FREE)' : 'REROLL ($rollCost)';
  }
  
  void closeShop() {
    hide();
    gameRef.onShopClosed();
  }
}

  void setItem(ShopItem item) async {
    currentItem = item;

    nameText.text = item.name.toUpperCase();

      position: Vector2((basePanelWidth - 140) / 2 + 90, basePanelHeight - 65),
    );
    add(continueButton);
    
    // Continue button glow effect
    final continueButtonGlow = RectangleComponent(
      size: Vector2(140, 45),
      paint: Paint()
        ..color = Colors.transparent
        ..style = PaintingStyle.stroke
        ..strokeWidth = 3
        ..color = const Color(0xFF4CAF50).withOpacity(0.5)
        ..maskFilter = const MaskFilter.blur(BlurStyle.normal, 8),
      position: Vector2((basePanelWidth - 140) / 2 + 90, basePanelHeight - 65),
    );
    add(continueButtonGlow);
    
    final continueButtonText = TextComponent(
      text: 'CONTINUE',
      textRenderer: TextPaint(
        style: const TextStyle(
          color: Colors.white,
          fontSize: 16,
          fontWeight: FontWeight.w900,
          letterSpacing: 1.5,
          shadows: [
            Shadow(
              color: Colors.black,
              blurRadius: 4,
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
      anchor: Anchor.center,
      position: Vector2(70, 22.5),
    );
    continueButton.add(continueButtonText);
    
    // Store continue button reference for tap detection
    continueButton.add(Component());
    continueButton.children.register<Component>();
    
    // Initially hidden
    hide();
    
    // Initial items will be populated after onLoad completes
  }
  
  void _setupItemSlots() {
    // Create item slots with responsive positioning
    itemSlots = [];
    
    // Calculate positions relative to panel center (since panel anchor is center)
    final totalSlotsWidth = 3 * scaledSlotWidth + 2 * scaledSlotSpacing;
    final slotsStartX = -totalSlotsWidth / 2; // Start from left side relative to center
    final slotY = 121 * (scaledPanelHeight / basePanelHeight) - scaledPanelHeight / 2; // Relative to center
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      final slot = ShopSlot(
        position: Vector2(
          slotsStartX + (scaledSlotWidth / 2) + i * (scaledSlotWidth + scaledSlotSpacing), // Center each slot
          slotY + (scaledSlotHeight / 2), // Center vertically
        ),
      );
      // Update slot size to match scaled dimensions
      slot.size = Vector2(scaledSlotWidth, scaledSlotHeight);
      itemSlots.add(slot);
      add(slot);
    }
  }
  
  void show() {
    isVisible = true;
    opacity = 1.0;
  }
  
  void hide() {
    isVisible = false;
    opacity = 0.0;
  }
  
  @override
  void onRemove() {
    cleanupResponsive();
    super.onRemove();
  }
  
  /// Override to refresh child components when layout updates
  @override
  void updateResponsiveLayout() {
    super.updateResponsiveLayout();
    _refreshChildComponents();
  }
  
  /// Refresh all child components with current scaled dimensions
  void _refreshChildComponents() {
    // Remove and recreate all child components with new scaled dimensions
    removeAll(children.toList());
    _setupItemSlots();  // Initialize itemSlots first
    _setupVisualComponents();
    // Note: Don't call rollShopItems() here as it would reset the shop items
  }
  
  @override
  bool onTapDown(TapDownEvent event) {
    if (!isVisible) return false;
    
    final localPoint = event.localPosition;
    
    // Check if roll button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final rollButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      rollButton.position.x,
      rollButton.position.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (rollButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      rollShopItems();
      return true;
    }
    
    // Check if continue button was tapped - updated for 10% bigger dimensions
    final continueButtonPosition = Vector2((basePanelWidth - 154) / 2 + 99, basePanelHeight - 71.5); // Updated from 140/90/65
    final continueButtonRect = Rect.fromLTWH(
      continueButtonPosition.x,
      continueButtonPosition.y,
      154, // Updated from 140
      49.5, // Updated from 45
    );
    
    if (continueButtonRect.contains(Offset(localPoint.x, localPoint.y))) {
      closeShop();
      return true;
    }
    
    return false;
  }
  
  void rollShopItems() {
    // Check if all items are sold (free roll)
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    
    // Get roll cost from configuration
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    
    // Check if player has enough coins to roll
    if (gameRef.hero.coins < rollCost) {
      return; // Not enough coins to roll
    }
    
    // Spend coins for rolling (if not free)
    if (rollCost > 0) {
      gameRef.hero.spendCoins(rollCost);
    }
    
    final availableItems = _getAvailableItems();
    final random = Random();
    
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
      if (availableItems.isNotEmpty) {
        final randomItem = availableItems[random.nextInt(availableItems.length)];
        itemSlots[i].setItem(randomItem);
      }
    }
    
    // Update roll button text after rolling
    final newRollCost = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10;
    rollButtonText.text = 'REROLL ($newRollCost)';
  }
  
  List<ShopItem> _getAvailableItems() {
    final itemConfig = ItemConfig.instance;
    final shopConfig = WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig;
    List<ShopItem> availableItems = [];
    final random = Random();
    
    for (final itemData in itemConfig.items) {
      // Skip health-related items in 1HP Challenge mode
      if (gameRef.currentGameMode == GameMode.oneHpChallenge) {
        if (itemData.effect.type == 'heal' || 
            itemData.effect.type == 'max_health_increase') {
          continue; // Skip health items in 1HP mode
        }
      }
      
      // Calculate scaled price based on current wave using configuration
      double waveMultiplier = 1.0;
      double randomMultiplier = 1.0;
      
      if (shopConfig != null) {
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (shopConfig.waveMultiplier * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = (1.0 - shopConfig.randomVariance) + (random.nextDouble() * shopConfig.randomVariance * 2);
      } else {
        // Fallback to old hardcoded values
        waveMultiplier = 1.0 + (0.2 * (gameRef.currentWave - 1));
        randomMultiplier = 0.95 + (random.nextDouble() * 0.1);
      }
      
      final scaledCost = (itemData.cost * waveMultiplier * randomMultiplier).round();
      
      // Create dynamic name for ability cooldown reduction based on hero's ability
      if (itemData.id == 'dash_mastery') {
        final heroAbilityName = gameRef.hero.heroData.ability.name;
        availableItems.add(ShopItem(
          id: itemData.id,
          name: '$heroAbilityName Mastery',
          cost: scaledCost,
          description: '-25% ${heroAbilityName} Cooldown',
          icon: itemData.icon,
          onPurchase: () => _applyItemEffect(itemData),
        ));
      } else {
        availableItems.add(ShopItem.fromItemData(itemData, () => _applyItemEffect(itemData), scaledCost));
      }
    }
    
    return availableItems;
  }
  
  void _applyItemEffect(ItemData itemData) {
    switch (itemData.effect.type) {
      case 'heal':
        final healAmount = (gameRef.hero.maxHealth - gameRef.hero.health).clamp(0.0, itemData.effect.value);
        gameRef.hero.heal(healAmount);
        break;
      case 'dash_cooldown_multiplier':
        // Apply ability cooldown reduction
        gameRef.hero.abilityCooldownMultiplier *= itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'max_health_increase':
        gameRef.hero.maxHealth += itemData.effect.value;
        gameRef.hero.health += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'attack_speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.attackSpeedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'speed_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.speedMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      case 'range_multiplier':
        gameRef.hero.rangeMultiplier += itemData.effect.value;
        break;
      // New stackable passive effects
      case 'projectile_count':
      case 'projectile_bounces':
      case 'projectile_size':
      case 'life_steal':
      case 'shield_hp':
      case 'coin_multiplier':
      case 'heal_per_kill':
      case 'crit_chance':
      case 'clone_spawn':
      case 'max_health_boost':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Max health boost only affects max HP, not current HP
        break;
      case 'drone_count':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update drone count immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateDroneCount();
        break;
      case 'auto_injector':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Auto-injector HP bonus is applied on kill, not on purchase
        break;
      case 'enlarged_caliber':
        final maxStacks = itemData.effect.maxStacks ?? 1;
        gameRef.hero.addPassiveEffect(itemData.effect.type, maxStacks);
        // Update hero size immediately
        gameRef.hero.updateHeroSize();
        break;
      default:
        print('Unknown item effect type: ${itemData.effect.type}');
    }
  }
  
  void onItemPurchased() {
    // Update roll button text based on remaining items
    final allItemsSold = itemSlots.every((slot) => slot.currentItem == null);
    final rollCost = allItemsSold ? 0 : (WaveConfig.instance.shopConfig?.rollCost ?? 10);
    rollButtonText.text = rollCost == 0 ? 'REROLL (FREE)' : 'REROLL ($rollCost)';
  }
  
  void closeShop() {
    hide();
    gameRef.onShopClosed();
  }
}

    required this.name,

    required this.icon,

  });
  
  factory ShopItem.fromItemData(ItemData itemData, void Function() onPurchase, int scaledCost) {
    return ShopItem(
      id: itemData.id,
